Field_Value_or_Group_Info:
scroll-behavior: smooth;
font-size: [font-size]; /* rem units are relative to the font size of the HTML element - see https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/css-rem-vs-em-units */
margin: [tsp-calc tm / 3, round] 0 [tsp-calc tm / 3, round] [tsp-calc tm * 2];

display: block;
margin: [tsp-calc {image-margin-vertical}*2] auto; /* Double the vertical margin when image is centred */

/* Now using header background div method, which allows for background gradients also. When header background div is hidden, set the top padding to [tsp-calc spv + {header-height}] /* border-top: [header-height] [colour-header-background] solid; /* formerly margin-top, not border-top for smoother header.scrolled transitions */

Subfield_Value: Light Colour Scheme (Light background, dark text)
Dark Colour Scheme (Dark background, light text)
Light Tan Colour Scheme (Light Tan background, dark text)
